rukus.text: 17|41|ara abasya'i amara e kura'ane (bahu bisaya) barabara bibrta karechi yate tamra upadesa grahana kare. Kintu ete tamdera bimukhata'i brd'dhi paya.
17|42|Baluna, ‘yadi tamra sathe ara'o ilaha thakato yemana tara bale, tabe tara ‘arasa-adhipatira (naikatya labhera) upaya khumje berata [1].’
17|43|Tini pabitra, mahimanbita ebam tara ya bale ta theke tini bahu urdhbe.

17|44|Sata asamana ebam yamina ebam egulora antarbarti saba kichu tamra'i pabitrata o mahima ghosana kare [1] ebam emana kichu ne'i ya tamra saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana kare na; kintu tamdera pabitrata o mahima ghosana tomara bujhate para na; niscaya tini sahanasila, ksamaparayana.
17|45|Ara apani yakhana kura'ana patha karena takhana amara apanara o yara akhiratera upara imana rakhe na tadera madhye eka pracchanna parda rekhe de'i.

17|46|Ara amara tadera antarera upara abarana rekhe diyechi yena tara ta bujhate na pare ebam tadera kane diyechi badhirata; ‘apanara raba eka’, eta yakhana apani kura'ana theke ullekha karena takhana tara pitha dekhiye sare pare [1].

17|47|Yakhana tara kana pete apanara katha sune takhana tara kena kana pete sune ta amara bhalo jani ebam eta'o jani, gopane alocanakale yalimara bale, ‘tomara to eka jadugrastha byaktira anusarana karacha [1].
17|48|Dekhuna, tara apanara ki upama deya! Phale tara pathabhrasta hayeche [1], sutaram tara patha pabe na.
17|49|Ara tara bale, ‘amara asthite parinata o curna-bicurna hale'o ki nutana srstirupe ut'thita habo [1]?’

17|51|‘athaba emana kono srsti ya tomadera antare khuba'i bara mane haya [1]; ‘tabu'o tara balabe, ‘ke amaderake punarut'thita karabe?’ Baluna, ‘tini'i, yini tomaderake prathamabara srsti karechena [2].’ Atahpara tara apanara samane matha narabe [3] o balabe, ‘seta kabe[4]?’ Baluna, sambhabata seta habe sighra'i
17|52|‘yedina tini tomaderake dakabena ebam tomara tamra prasansara sathe tamra dake sara debe [1] ebam tomara mane karabe, tomara alpakala'i abasthana karechile [2].’
